job_title: Memory Systems Design Engineer Client and Graphics Platform Engineering
job_description:
• Deep knowledge of DRAM, Memory controller and PHY architecture and design conceptsUnderstanding platform level signal integrity and power integrity technologies a definite assetFamiliarity with industry-standard high-speed protocols, and test methodologiesHigh-speed I/O design experience, including understanding of Tx (transceiver), Rx (Receiver), PLL (phase lock loop)/DLL, Clocking, Equalization techniques and circuits, Training algorithms and FirmwareKnowledge of computer hardware architecture (GPU, CPU/APU, memory and bus logic technologies) and software architecture (driver, bios, firmware usage)Hands-on debug experience with GPU/APU, motherboards, memory interface, bus logic a definite assetLaboratory experience, including hands-on use of equipment: Oscilloscopes, Signal generators, BERT, Logic analyzers, etc.
• Experience with Windows and Linux operating systemsProgramming/software development knowledge with experience with scripting languages such as Ruby/Python/Perl.

• AMD Partner Hub Authorized Distributors AMD University Program Bachelor's or master's degree in electrical or computer engineering Provide systems engineering and post-silicon support for DDR/LPDDR/GDDR Memory interface IP.
